title: Understanding Data Inventory
text: Consider how having a comprehensive list of all data assets can impact the management and governance of data. Think about the benefits of knowing what data you have and where it is located.

title: The Role of Data Inventory in Governance
text: Reflect on how a data inventory might support or hinder the implementation of data governance policies. Does having a clear understanding of your data assets make it easier or harder to enforce governance rules?

title: Scalability and Data Management
text: Think about the challenges of scaling data governance. How might a data inventory contribute to or alleviate these challenges? Consider the role of organization and transparency in managing large-scale data.
